comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: Possibly William Boyd Carpenter, who traveled to the US several times to lecture at Harvard. This photo could have been taken on one of those trips. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Boyd_Carpenter

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.npg.org.uk/live/search/portrait.asp?LinkID=mp05135&am... is a photo from 1883 held by the UK National Portrait Gallery that definitely looks like the same man.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Jim Rees and swanq: Thanks for suggesting a more complete identification for the Bishop and offering visual verification.  We'll add the name information to our source data and reload it to Flickr.
